channel.title: BG problems
channel.description:
I have a background which basically loads from my index.dat file. When I open toms cache suite and load the cache it doesn't work. What other way can I put the new BG in as a PNG file.
I realize i can hardcode it like: [code] private Sprite bg; bg = new Sprite(path); bg.drawsprite(x,y) [/code]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: BG problems
